367930613178823695.Text: You think to climb higher in Brother Dagoth's eyes by defeating me? Well, then, you might rise at that. None of us Heartwights can die. The power of the Heart will bring us all back in time. But, yes, you might win Lord Dagoth's favor by defeating his lieutenants. No hard feelings, %PCName. I lose, I lose my rank. You lose, you lose all. You're playing for high stakes, %PCName. Are you sure you want to play? Surely, there is no dishonor for a mortal to serve a god?
